abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by composer and percussionist Lukas Ligeti at The Stone in the East Village.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ligeti’s residency at the club features him on percussion with a wide range of performers.

headline.main: Review: Lukas Ligeti’s Disparate Interests, on Display at the Stone
headline.print_headline: Experimenting With Instruments to See What Happens

snippet: Mr. Ligeti’s residency at the club features him on percussion with a wide range of performers.
